page.description: Alpha Anywhere allows you to define your own smart fields, which look at drop-down edit combo boxes.

argument.name: Function
argument.description: Type: C. Any valid Xbasic function with appropriate arguments.

argument.name: Bitmap
argument.description: Type: C. Optional. The name of a bitmap to put at the right edge of the control.

argument.name: Width
argument.description: Type: N. The width of the control.

argument.name: Varname
argument.description: Type: A. The variable that receives the return value from the function.
